text: baaz yahood kalimaath ko un ki theek jagah se her pher kar dete hai aur kehte hai ke hum ne suna aur na-farmaani ki aur sun us ke baghair ke tu suna jaaye aur hamaari riaayath kar! (lekin us kehne mein) apni zabaan ko pech9 dete hai aur deen mein taana dete hai aur agar ye log kehte ke hum ne suna aur humne farma-bardaari ki aur aap suniye aur hamein dekhiye to ye un ke liye bahuth behtar aur nihaayath hee munaasib tha,lekin Allah taâ€™ala ne un ke kufr ki wajeh se unhe laanath ki hai, pas ye bahuth hee kam imaan laate hai
